sys_openapi_operation.name: Submit deployment data
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Submit deployment data","fOperationId":"submitDeployments","fDescription":"Update / insert deployment data.

Deployments are identified by the combination of `pipelineId`, `environmentId` and `deploymentSequenceNumber`, and existing deployment data for the same deployment will be replaced if it exists and the `updateSequenceNumber` of existing data is less than the incoming data.

Submissions are processed asynchronously. Submitted data will eventually be available in Jira. Most updates are available within a short period of time, but may take some time during peak load and/or maintenance times. The `getDeploymentByKey` operation can be used to confirm that data has been stored successfully (if needed).

In the case of multiple deployments being submitted in one request, each is validated individually prior to submission. Details of which deployments failed submission (if any) are available in the response object.

Only Connect apps that define the `jiraDeploymentInfoProvider` module, and on-premise integrations, can access this resource.
This resource requires the 'WRITE' scope for Connect apps.
","fPath":"/deployments/0.1/bulk","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fDescription":"Deployment data to submit.
","fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson3039149445","fTitle":"SubmitDeploymentRequest","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["deployments"],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"properties","fTitle":"Properties","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fMaxProperties":5,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fAdditionalProperties":{"value":{"fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}},"fDescription":"Properties assigned to deployment data that can then be used for delete / query operations.

Examples might be an account or user ID that can then be used to clean up data if an account is removed from the Provider system.

Properties are supplied as key/value pairs, and a maximum of 5 properties can be supplied, keys cannot contain ':' or start with '_'.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"deployments","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMinItems":1,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"requestapplicationjson3039149445","fTitle":"DeploymentData","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["deploymentSequenceNumber","description","displayName","environment","lastUpdated","pipeline","state","updateSequenceNumber","url"],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"deploymentSequenceNumber","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"This is the identifier for the deployment. It must be unique for the specified pipeline and environment. It must be a monotonically increasing number, as this is used to sequence the deployments.
","fFormat":"int64","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"},{"fName":"updateSequenceNumber","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A number used to apply an order to the updates to the deployment, as identified by the deploymentSequenceNumber, in the case of out-of-order receipt of update requests. It must be a monotonically increasing number. For example, epoch time could be one way to generate the updateSequenceNumber.
","fFormat":"int64","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"},{"fName":"issueKeys","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxItems":100,"fMinItems":1,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"requestapplicationjson3039149445","fTitle":"IssueKey","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fPattern":"^\w{1,255}-\d{1,255}$","fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"An issue key that references an issue in Jira.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Deprecated. The Jira issue keys to associate the Deployment information with.
Should replace this field with the "associations" field to associate Deployment information with issueKeys or other types of associations.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":true,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"associations","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxItems":2,"fMinItems":1,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"requestapplicationjson3039149445","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The entities to associate the Deployment information with.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"displayName","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The human-readable name for the deployment. Will be shown in the UI.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"url","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":2000,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A URL users can use to link to this deployment, in this environment.
","fFormat":"uri","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"description","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A short description of the deployment
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"lastUpdated","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The last-updated timestamp to present to the user as a summary of the state of the deployment.
","fFormat":"date-time","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"glide_date_time"},{"fName":"label","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"An (optional) additional label that may be displayed with deployment information. Can be used to display version information etc. for the deployment.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"state","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":["unknown","pending","in_progress","cancelled","failed","rolled_back","successful"],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The state of the deployment
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"choice"},{"fName":"pipeline","fTitle":"Pipeline","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["displayName","id","url"],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"id","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The identifier of this pipeline, must be unique for the provider.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"displayName","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The name of the pipeline to present to the user.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"url","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":2000,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A URL users can use to link to this deployment pipeline.
","fFormat":"uri","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"This object models the Continuous Delivery (CD) Pipeline concept, an automated process (usually comprised of multiple stages)

for getting software from version control right through to the production environment.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"environment","fTitle":"Environment","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["displayName","id","type"],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"id","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The identifier of this environment, must be unique for the provider so that it can be shared across pipelines.

","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"commands","fTitle":"Commands","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"requestapplicationjson3039149445","fTitle":"Command","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"command","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The command name.

Each submitted deployment that is of a valid format will eventually be available in Jira.

Details of which deployments were submitted and which failed submission (due to data format problems etc.) are available in the response object.
","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson0672203570","fTitle":"SubmitDeploymentsResponse","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"acceptedDeployments","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"responseapplicationjson0672203570","fTitle":"DeploymentKey","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["deploymentSequenceNumber","environmentId","pipelineId"],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"pipelineId","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The identifier of a pipeline, must be unique for the provider.

A deployment key is a composite key that consists of `pipelineId`, `environmentId` and `deploymentSequenceNumber`.

A deployment may be rejected if it was only associated with unknown issue keys.

Note that a deployment that isn't updated due to it's updateSequenceNumber being out of order is not considered a failed submission.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"rejectedDeployments","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"responseapplicationjson0672203570","fTitle":"RejectedDeployment","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["errors","key"],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"key","fTitle":"DeploymentKey","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["deploymentSequenceNumber","environmentId","pipelineId"],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"pipelineId","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The identifier of a pipeline, must be unique for the provider.

It must be unique for the specified pipeline and environment. It must be a monotonically increasing number, as this is used to sequence the deployments.
","fFormat":"int64","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Fields that uniquely reference a deployment.

The object is comprised of the key of the rejected deployment and the corresponding error messages.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Details of deployments that have not been accepted for submission, usually due to a problem with the request data.

The object will contain the deployment key and any errors associated with that deployment that have prevented it being submitted.

","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Issue keys that are not known on this Jira instance (if any).

These may be invalid keys (e.g. `UTF-8` is sometimes incorrectly identified as a Jira issue key), or they may be for projects that no longer exist.

If a deployment has been associated with issue keys other than those in this array it will still be stored against those valid keys.
If a deployment was only associated with issue keys deemed to be invalid it won't be persisted.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The result of a successful submitDeployments request.
